expo.name: Mindful Bell
expo.description: A mindfulness bell app for meditation practice. This app is for general wellness purposes only and is not intended for medical diagnosis or treatment.

infoPlist.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: This app uses tracking to provide personalized meditation recommendations with your consent.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Location access is used for mindful location-based reminders.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Microphone access is optional for guided meditation features.
infoPlist.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: This app does not access health data - it is for general wellness purposes only.
infoPlist.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: This app does not update health data - it is for general wellness purposes only.
